name: Robo Rush
description:
Robo Rush is a fast-paced, single-player, action platformer featuring one mode, one level, and one goal: Reach the end as fast as possible. You will have to conquer a wide variety of platforming challenges: Spike Avoiding, Platform Stepping, Missile Dodging, Button Pressing and Wall Grabbing! Robo Rush encourages quick reflexes and a dedication to the mastery of this course. The controls are simple, and easy to use on both game pad or keyboard.

You also have the ability to reset your run at any moment. At the press of a button the stage resets, and you are sent back to the start, making testing new routes and strategies easy and approachable.

Robo Rush does not have difficulty settings, however finishing the game is approachable for a wide variety of skill levels.
